title: Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses
description: These days, you have many choices regarding places to purchase glasses. A growingly popular method is through online retailers. That said, you may be reluctant to get glasses. However, experiencing certain symptoms may leave you with no other choice.  The post Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses appeared first on AV Club.
author: Contributor Content

title: Fallout Adds Macaulay Culkin to Season 2 Cast
description: Amazon’s hit video game adaptation Fallout is already hitting “start” on Season 2: Macaulay Culkin has joined the cast in a recurring role for its upcoming sophomore season, our sister site Deadline reports. No details on his role have been confirmed yet, but Deadline says he’s playing “a crazy genius-type character.” Fallout, based on the […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: TVLine Items: Mass Effect Series, Bill Maher’s New Comedy Special and More
description: Another video game series is headed to Prime Video. A TV adaptation of Mass Effect is officially in development at Amazon MGM Studios, with Daniel Casey (F9: The Fast Saga) attached to write, our sister site Variety reports. No plot details are currently available for the potential series, which was first reported to be in […]
